subject: Soccer
Women and Girls
Women's World Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Lindsey Horan just signed another contract with Paris St.-Germain, ensuring that she will continue to live her dream but also that she will remain in Paris while the U.S. national team prepares for next summer’s Women’s World Cup.
snippet: Lindsey Horan just signed another contract with Paris St.-Germain, ensuring that she will continue to live her dream but also that she will remain in Paris while the U.S. national team prepares for next summer’s Women’s World Cup.
